title: How to Make Strawberry Vinaigrette

steps.headline: Blend the ingredients together until smooth.
Pour into a serving container and place in the refrigerator to chill.
Serve.
steps.description: This makes an ideal dressing over rocket. Add some shaved Parmesan, pecan nuts and freshly ground black pepper for a complete salad.

text: Blend the ingredients together until smooth.  Pour into a serving container and place in the refrigerator to chill.  Serve. This makes an ideal dressing over rocket. Add some shaved Parmesan, pecan nuts and freshly ground black pepper for a complete salad.
